mapper.sql: id, version, is_force AS isForce, mobile_type AS mobileType, intro, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, created_by AS createdBy, state, apk_url AS apkUrl, game_download_switch AS gameDownloadSwitch, index_banner_switch AS indexBannerSwitch
mapper.select:
SELECT vsn.version AS version, vsn.is_force AS is_force, vsn.is_auth AS is_auth, vsn.index_banner_switch AS index_banner_switch, vchlist.channel_code AS channel_code, vchn.game_download_switch AS game_download_switch
FROM t_sys_version vsn INNER JOIN t_sys_version_channel vchn INNER JOIN t_sys_version_channellist vchlist ON vsn.id = vchn.version_id AND vchn.channel_code = vchlist.channel_code AND vsn.version = #{version} AND vsn.mobile_type = #{mobile_type} AND vchn.channel_code = #{channel_code} order by vchn.updated_at desc LIMIT 1
